name: 2014 Calendar (Limited Edition)
description: This calendar is the culmination of a year-long lettering project called 12 in '13 for '14. This project grew out of my growing passion for hand-lettering and sign-painting, as well as a love for documenting the creative process from beginning to end. More details on the project's inception here. For the main titles, I hand-lettered a dozen header options each month with a Pentel brush pen, and then posted them on my blog for public voting. After curating the selects, I rendered the final titles in Illustrator and incorporated them into the layouts. To complete the calendar, I hand-lettered a supplementary set of numerals and capitals for the week titles. These were also refined in Illustrator, compiled in FontLab, and then typeset into the final calendar layouts. A full post on the process here. These 6" x 6" calendars, limited edition of 20, are screen printed by hand in Toronto with water-based inks on 245gsm pure white 100% cotton archival paper. They are hand-trimmed and include a personalized, hand-lettered, numbered & editioned cover sheet. The calendar is bound with an elegant chrome bulldog clip, perfect for mounting in your home or office. Currently only shipping within Canada through the shop. A $10.00 flat rate will be applied (for the cost of regular parcel shipping and a flat mailer). Toronto friends: contact me about hand-delivery to save on shipping. Click on the photo to enlarge. More detailed photographs on my blog. Check out the making of the calendar here. © Christopher Rouleau 2013. All rights reserved.

name: Rouleau Numerals typeface
description:
This set of numerals (0-9) was created as part of my 12 in '13 for '14 calendar lettering project, and used as the primary typeface on my 2014 calendar. Each digit was hand-lettered with Pentel brush pens, refined in Illustrator, and compiled in FontLab. Check out some process work here.

After checkout, the TrueType (.ttf) font file will be emailed to you. No delivery charge!

For personal use only. If you have big plans for commercial projects, please contact me to negotiate pricing.

© Christopher Rouleau 2013. All rights reserved.

name: Origami Alphabet (Limited Edition)
description: In May 2013, Razorblade Origami Alphabet was selected to participate in Creative Type Five, an annual curated exhibition of typographic artwork from Toronto illustrators, artists and graphic designers. A full post on the exhibit here. Through the methods of incision and paper folding, this sculptural alphabet explores the underlying form and structure of letters, based on their geometry and inherent lines of symmetry. Check out some process work here. I have decided to create 2 limited edition, 9" x9" framed versions of Razorblade Origami Alphabet. Each piece takes approximately 8 hours to craft by hand. Currently only shipping within Canada. Due to the artwork's delicate nature, please contact me before purchase to discuss special shipping options to your city. Click on the photo to enlarge. More detailed photographs on my blog. © Christopher Rouleau 2013. All rights reserved.

name: Alphabet 100 mini prints
description: These letters are part of the The Alphabet 100 project, my 2012 lettering project. There are 52 letters to choose from – A through Z, in both uppercase and lowercase. Pictured here is upper case A. View all the letters here, and the complete list of options here. These 9" x 9" posters are ink jet printed in Toronto in full colour on 180gsm ultra white matte cotton-based art paper. Fits perfectly in the simple (and affordable!) Ikea Ribba frame. After placing your order, simply send me an email with your letter(s) of choice. Currently only shipping within Canada. A $5.00 flat rate will be applied (for the cost of regular parcel shipping and a flat mailer). Toronto friends: contact me about hand-delivery to save on shipping. Custom sizes available on demand; please contact me for details. Click on the photo to enlarge. More detailed photographs (including upper case B and C) on my blog. © Christopher Rouleau 2013. All rights reserved.

name: Alphabet 100 print
description: The Alphabet 100 project was born in January 2012. Each week for 52 weeks, I chose one letter, drew 100 variations of it, and then rendered the best one in Illustrator. After 5200 thumbnail sketches and over 200 hours of work, here are the complete upper and lower case alphabets. These 24" x 24" prints are ink jet printed in Toronto in full colour on 180gsm ultra white matte cotton-based art paper. Each illustration is 2" x 2". The project was featured on Quipsologies in July 2012. Currently only shipping within Canada. $15 flat rate will be applied (for the cost of regular parcel shipping and a mailing tube). Toronto friends: contact me about hand-delivery to save on shipping. Custom letters always available on demand; please contact me for details. Click on the photo to enlarge. More detailed photographs on my blog. © Christopher Rouleau 2013. All rights reserved.

name: Montréal map print
description: Ces cartes 18" x 18" sont imprimées à Toronto au jet d’encre en couleurs sur une feuille d’art de papier ultra blanche mat en base de coton de 180 gsm.   Présentement, l’expédition ne se fait qu’au Canada et des frais de 15$ s’appliquent (pour frais de transport de colis régulier et un tube d’expédition). Pour mes amis de Toronto: n’hésitez pas à me contacter pour une livraison en personne pour éviter les coûts d’expédition.   Les formats personnalisés sont disponibles sur demande, n’hésitez pas à communiquer avec moi pour plus d’informations.   Cliquez sur l’image pour l’agrandir. Vous trouverez plus de photographies détaillées sur mon blog. © Christopher Rouleau 2012.
